title: Challenge-oriented Full-Stack Developer
intro: Iâ€™m a passionate software developer, with a strong curiosity for technology and a deep enthusiasm for creating innovative projects.
woopsie_creations_intro: With friends of mine, we co-founded Woopsie Creations, a passionate indie game and software development studio.
woopsie_creations_arcade_games_intro: Arcade-Games is a project dedicated to creating games written in x86 16-bit Assembly, developed using NASM and executed with DOSBox.
woopsie_creations_arcade_games_arcade_pa: We are currently working on building an arcade, which will feature a collection of games.

It is currently powered by a Rock Pi 4 Plus, where the games run seamlessly, and we are planning to enhance it further with custom hardware components, a dedicated OS and the possibility for anyone to add their own games (in Assembly of course)
woopsie_creations_arcade_games_game_list: And here's a list of games that we are working on, in plain x86 16-bit Assembly.
